item.title: Computer Mythology
item.description: I love computer mythology, reading about old legends and great hackers surmounting the odds. Linux: Where Don't We Want To Go Today? -- Submitted by Pancrazio De Mauro, paraphrasing some well-known sales talk I also like that the communities are so different in their approaches to defining computing
